casebody.data:
U.S. BANK NATIONAL ASSOCIATION, Trustee
v.
Bonnie L. CHRISTOPHERSEN et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided April 18, 2018 Bonnie L. Christophersen, self-represented, in support of the petition. Jeffrey M. Knickerbocker, in opposition.

The defendant Bonnie L. Christophersen's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 179 Conn. App. 378 , 180 A.3d 611 (2018), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
